'''Enhancement Ore''' is an Enhancement Material for [[Weapon]]s that provides 400 [[Weapon EXP]].

==Forging==
The following recipe yields 1 Enhancement Ore and up to 40 stacks can be ordered per forge queue slot. It shares the daily 300,000 Weapon Experience forging cap with [[Fine Enhancement Ore]] and [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]] (forged with Crystal Chunks).
{{Recipe
|type = Forging
|time = 5s
|Mora = 5
|Iron Chunk = 2
|sort = Iron Chunk;Mora
}}
